description: This file defines a UI component named 'Button' using the LightningJS framework, with a template, state management, and input handling.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the HTML structure of the Button component, displaying text based on the component's state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component state with 'isFavorited', 'favoriteText', and 'unfavoriteText'.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the Enter key input to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
